forum.revisionInfo: Edited {revisionCount} time, newest at the top|Edited {revisionCount} times, newest at the top
forum.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this edit's contents from the history?
forum.confirmRollback: Are you sure you want to change your current post?
forum.noDiff: No differences found between these two contents.

settings.title: Diff Settings
settings.neighborLinesHelp: Specify the neighbor line count that you want to show.
settings.usePoint: Use point as decimal seperator for float values.
settings.separateBlock: Show a separator between different diff hunks in HTML renderers
settings.archiveOldsInfo: If x â‰¥ A, first y=mx+b revisions for the post will be stored as merged & compressed. The x refers to post's revision count. Float values of y will be rounded to the next lowest integer value.
settings.useCrons: Use crons to archive old revisions
settings.useCronsHelp: You must add Cron entry to your server to make this option work. It'll work weekly on sundays at 02:00 AM. If you disable this option and enable above, all of the post's revisions will be scanned for archiving when the related post is revised.
settings.archiveInfo: Keep in mind that you can disable both options and run php flarum diff:archive command to archive old revisions manually.
settings.mergeThreshold: Merge Treshold for the Combined Renderer
settings.mergeThresholdHelp: This determines whether a replace-type block should be merged or not depending on the content changed ratio, which values between 0 and 1.
